alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:36AM CDT until July 07 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 736 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Tom Steed Reservoir to 5 miles northwest of Boone, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Frederick, Cache, Elgin, Snyder, Tipton, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Roosevelt, Manitou, Headrick, Cooperton, Meers, Tom Steed Reservoir, Lake Lawtonka, Boone, Fort Sill, Lake Ellsworth, and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
